title: [Paragon] LFM Diamond2 - Challenger
body:
Due to the departure of our most recent LoL team, we are currently looking to fill the hole left by the previous team. This team will be a competitive team striving to play in the upcoming season of the Oceanic Challenger Series and Looking towards the Oceanic Pro League Qualifiers.

Requirements:
Diamond 2 +
Good Attitude, Don't want toxic players.
Thrive to become the best.
Strong Mechanics.
Ability to maintain strong practice schedule.
And Maturity.

If you are interested in this position please add me on the client "Paragon Miracle" and send me a message saying that your from the boards and you are interested in playing for the team. You may also send me an email at lachie@paragonesports.net with an application.

~ Lachie "Miracle" 
Owner of Paragon eSports.
